text: Rice People () is a 1994 Cambodian French Swiss German drama movie directed by Rithy Panh and was based on the 1966 novel No Harvest But a Thorn by Shahnon Ahmad. It stars Peng Phan, Mom Soth, Chhim Naline, Sophy Sodany. ==Other websites== * * Category:1994 drama movies Category:Cambodian movies Category:French drama movies Category:Swiss drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Rithy Panh
title: Rice People
